name: Venomous Bite
description: Upon activation, Arachne's next Basic Attack within 5s does additional damage and infects the target with Venom, dealing damage over time and healing Arachne every 0.5s for 3s.
stats: Initial Damage: 50/75/100/125/150 (+35% of your physical power)
Damage per Tick: 10/20/30/40/50 (+10% of your physical power)
Healing per Tick: 8/16/24/32/40 (+8% of your physical power)
